topic.title: Add saving current state (then login)
topic.body: Volume, list of queued tracks, position in queue, history. It's handy for large queue lists or listening audio books.

1517906635_1LUMCFAnp4YvKKufrot9Weq15gDvR.body:
> [zerolstnmobile](#comment_3_1EmrB8xSDYobVFSc3Kad1vx1EPaPR2myCW): Yes, I plan to implement this via local storage, which I've noticed a few zites make use of already. Shouldn't be too difficult and might actually clean up some code that is used to pass these states around the website.

Great!
